ygData.subject: Re: Maximal Happanings
ygData.msgSnippet: Ragnar showed a half-smile on his face. He clasped his hands in his back. Ragnar: Katya received a bashing, just as she thought she would. We are now Warriors

Ragnar showed a half-smile on his face. He clasped his hands in his 
back.

Ragnar: Katya received a bashing, just as she thought she would. We 
are now Warriors of the Maximals. As for Owlhawk, we offered to teach 
him our ways. He shows great promises as a Clan warrior, and Katya can 
develop those. As for me... I will assist her in this task, but she 
can work without me for now. How can I help you right now?

--- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@c...> wrote:
> ::Rodimus Prime::
> 
> Rodimus was getting mad. This Predacon had requested the meeting but 
refused to speak.
> 
> "Ok if you dont want to talk, we'll let you rest."
> 
> Rodimus looks at the guards in his office.
> (I cant remember who is in there, it's been so long since we started 
this meeting.)
> 
> "Guys, take this Predacon to the security cells. I want him held, 
untill he decides to talk about whatever it is he originally wanted 
too. Treat him fairly though."
> 
> With that Rodimus gets up and leaves his office. He thinks as he 
walks, "The office is good but I'll need to move some of my belongind 
in there to personalize it."
> 
> Rodimus walks untill he finds Ragnar.
> 
> "What was the outcome of the fight?" He asks.
> 
> ::Kup::
> 
> Kup had been waiting for this new bot(Cheetor) to come out fo the 
CR's forever and he was tired of waiting. He walked out of the room, 
and went to the Mess Hall. Kup got himself a glass of 
Ener-Gin(Alchoholic Energon in human terms) and sat at a table. Maybe 
someone would join him.
